_metadata.description: Defines basic persona categories with linguistic patterns and behavioral signals.

aggressive.name: Aggressive
aggressive.use_when: Counterpart dominates or pressures for quick concessions.
aggressive.how: Respond with calm boundaries, avoid escalation, redirect focus to mutual goals.

collaborative.name: Collaborative
collaborative.use_when: Negotiation involves long-term relationships or shared outcomes.
collaborative.how: Encourage brainstorming, emphasize fairness, highlight joint wins.

analytical.name: Analytical
analytical.use_when: Counterpart prefers logic and facts over emotions.
analytical.how: Provide clear evidence, avoid vague statements, highlight ROI.
